plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear a crown, but I'm not a king. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow from a tiny seed.
🌳 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🍃 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am a home for seeds, and sometimes I'm juicy and sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 You can eat me.
🌸 I grow on a tree or vine.
🍉 Watermelon is an example of me.

plant.question: I drink water from the earth, and help the plant stand tall and firm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am underground.
🪵 I hold the plant in place.
🌧 I absorb water and nutrients.

plant.question: I use the sun to make food. I am usually green, and I flutter in the breeze. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am on the branches of a tree.
🍃 Caterpillars love to eat me.
🌳 I am part of a tree or bush.

plant.question: I am a long, thin part of a plant that holds up leaves and flowers. What am I?

hints.text: ⬆️ I help the plant grow up high.
💐 I connect the roots to the leaves.
🪴 I am green and can be woody.

plant.question: I am a plant that can live for many years, even through the winter. I have a thick trunk.

hints.text: 🪵 Birds build nests in me.
🌳 I am bigger than a bush.
🍁 I can lose my leaves in the autumn.

plant.question: I am a small, tough structure that can grow into a new plant. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I can be planted in soil.
🌻 I am how plants reproduce.
🍎 I can be found inside a fruit.

plant.question: I am colorful and often fragrant, attracting bees and butterflies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I can be given as a gift.
🌸 I help plants make seeds.
🌷 I have petals.

plant.question: I'm a type of plant that climbs up walls or other plants. I often have tendrils to help me hold on.

hints.text: 🍇 Some types of me grow grapes.
🌿 I can cover a fence.
🪴 Ivy is an example of me.

plant.question: I am the process by which plants make their own food using sunlight, water, and carbon dioxide.

hints.text: ☀️ Sunlight is essential for me to occur.
💧 Water is needed for me to work.
🍃 Chlorophyll helps me use light.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and cold. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am often seen in winter.
☃️ You can make a snowman with me.
🌨️ I am made of frozen water.

weather.question: I come after rain, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 You can see me when the sun shines through rain.
☀️ I am an arc in the sky.
🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am a star.
🌞 I give us light and warmth.
😎 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I’m a big white blanket floating in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like fluffy animals.
🌧️ I can bring rain.
💨 I am made of tiny water droplets.

weather.question: I can be gentle or fierce, and I make the trees sway. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can carry leaves.
🌬️ I am moving air.
🪁 I help kites fly.

weather.question: I'm frozen raindrops, small and hard. I can hurt if I hit you!

hints.text: 🧊 I am a form of precipitation.
🤕 You don't want to be outside when I fall heavily.
⚾ Sometimes I am the size of marbles.

weather.question: I am a storm with a swirling center, strong winds, and heavy rain, that forms over warm ocean waters.

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the center.
🌊 I can cause flooding.
🧭 People track me to know where I am going.

weather.question: I am a dark cloud that brings lightning and thunder.

hints.text: ⚡ I am very loud.
☔ You will need an umbrella when I visit.
⛈️ I'm a type of electrical storm.

weather.question: I am a rotating column of air that touches both the ground and a cumulonimbus cloud.

hints.text: 🌪️ I am a very dangerous weather phenomenon.
⚠️ Seeing a funnel shape in the sky is a warning.
🏠 You should seek shelter underground when I am near.

weather.question: I am a long period of unusually hot weather.

hints.text: 🥵 I can be dangerous for your health if you don't stay hydrated.
☀️ I can cause droughts.
🍦 Ice cream is a great treat during me.
